EmailTemplate.name: OBC Mails - Post-OBC Reminder - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: [TO DO]: Reminder: Your Next Steps with Zeitgold
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
I hope you are doing well!
Since our start is around the corner, I want to remind you of the remaining steps with me in Onboarding. Please complete these tasks by no later than [the 20. of the month before Zeitgold/ the end of the week]â€‹:
[INSERT Steps from Post-OBC Mail OR from last mail]
This will ensure that we can integrate you into our system and answer any open questions in a timely manner. As always, if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at service@zeitgold.com or by telephone at 030/30808111.
My best, {{{Sender.FirstName}}} at Zeitgold
